channel.description:
#
:angel: [color=darkgrey] Welcome to Purgatory III: The Reckoning![/color] :smiling_imp:
Hosted by @clonedcheese and @DatBird !
Designated Alt Mod: @DatBird
**_You and 8 others are trapped in purgatory! Can you send the demons to hell or will you doom everything by allowing them into heaven?!_** # Hydra!! Each slot in this game may be composed of up to 2 heads. # Rules and Punishments Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up. Don't angleshoot. Don't be rude. Don't use big letters. Twenty On Topic Posts per Day The usual. # Gameplay ### The game is played in two phases. [color=lightblue]**Heaven Phase**[/color] and [color=red]**Hell Phase.**[/color] **The Game begins in the [color=red]**Hell Phase.**[/color]** During the [color=red] **Hell Phase**[/color], you must choose a player to send to hell. To vote for someone, simply type **/Vote (Playername)** or **/Send (Playername)**. After someone is sent to hell, their alignment will be revealed and they will be unable to talk in the thread **Votes will be plurality based. _Majority is in effect._ All votes must ping @clonedcheese; any vote that fail to do so will be ignored. If there is a tie, it will be broken by RNG**. After one player has been sent to hell, the heaven phase will begin. During the [color=lightblue] **Heaven Phase**[/color], you must choose a player to send to Heaven. Voting is done the same way, their alignment will flip and they'll be unable to speak, except for in a private Heaven discord. After the heaven phase, a new hell phase starts and the cycle repeats. **There is no night time in purgatory! Immediately after a flip, the next phase will begin!** **Heaven and Hell phases both have a maximum length of 48 hours. At the end of each phase, if no one has been sent the player with the most votes will be sent. Ties are broken by RNG.** # Victory [color=lightblue]The humans will win if they manage to send the majority (2 of the 3) Demons to hell![/color] [color=red]Demons will win if the majority of them are sent to heaven! [/color] **The Demons will have a private chat where ALL Demons (including those sent to hell/heaven) can communicate at any time.** # [color=orange]Judgement Day[/color] **When 50% of the Living players are demons, a [color=darkorange] Judgement Day[/color] phase begins.** **The Living players lose their ability to vote (but may still speak in the thread). All of the Lost Souls sent to heaven (does not include demons currently in heaven) must privately (NOT IN THE THREAD.) vote to send a player to hell within 24 hours.** **If the player sent is a lost soul, the Demons win!** **If the player sent is a demon, the game proceeds to the next hell phase.** # Role Cards > ### [color=red]Demon[/color] > You win when two demons have snuck into heaven, or when the Lost Souls lose a Judgement Day. > ### [color=grey]Lost Soul[/color] > You win when two demons have been sent to hell. # Role List: **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=darkgrey] Lost Soul [/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** **[color=red] Demon[/color]** ### Credit to Marl for setup creation. ## Player List 1. Zone_Q11 2. an_gorta_pratai 3. Moleland 4. Trivial 5. Anagram 6. Yawn 7. Raven 8. Darth Tarbor 9. Wazza ## Specs 1. Marshal 2. Katze 3. Astand 4. Thunal33 5. Arete ## Backups 1. Geyde # Game will start [date=2020-08-17 time=09:00:00 timezone="America/Los_Angeles"] unless I get everyone's confirmations so confirm nurds Links: [Hell Phase 1 results](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-purgatory-iii-the-reckoning-7-9-0-2-lmao-hellphase-2/83388/485?u=datbird) [Heaven Phase 1 Results](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/vfm-purgatory-iii-the-reckoning-7-9-0-2-lmao-hellphase-2/83388/894?u=datbird)

item.dc:creator: Zone_Q11
item.description:
If someone were to make an account of Zone_Q12, then… probably not.

If I were to meet a duplicate of myself and have him play as Zone_Q12… then we will most likely not play together in the first place to avoid confusion and similarities.

If I were to meet a stranger with similar playstyle as mine, then… it depends. I know I am a hypocrite, but from what I see nobody sees the world/gamestate the same way I do.
If they really are similar to me… if they really are just like me… then I know that simple gestures will be enough to cool them down.

I already admitted my sin of breaking Rule 9 in SFoL63.
…I didn’t expect people to make lightly of my hitlist / grudgelist in the first place.
Then again, I didn’t expect my victim to villainize me after I openly stated that I will be hunting him either.
…I should’ve known better to never trust humans.

I don’t expect much from my future self. Whether I actually tunnel someone or not depends on my mood, and that… has never been a constant.
